scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Ashley Brown
scrape.text: i tried really hard to finish this i promise i did. but i just couldn't get through it! it doesnt come along often that i don't like the book i'm reading one bit, and i often feel quilt for having those feelings about a book! lol. Sadly this book was one of them, i felt like the book was a bunch of nonsense and every time i thought we where getting somewhere to what the book was about, right back to nonsense. i had no idea what the main character was talking about half the time. the characters felt distant from each other, and just not very likeable.
